title: How Naked can the DJI Spark get?! + Test flight
description: The DJI Spark is HERE:  The DJI Spark w/ extra batteries:  The DJI Spark is the smallest drone that DJI makes. And my personal opinion is that if you want a drone with USABLE footage, DJI is the way to go. The spark is their newest addition to the drone line up, coming in at half the price of the DJI Mavic, but also a lower resolution only filming in 1080p. But its small size might make up for the dip in video quality.   We'll have to put that to the test after I reassemble the DJI Spark from this teardown video.
